Uses of Class
org.knime.core.node.workflow.WorkflowContext

  • Packages that use WorkflowContext 
    Package Description
    org.knime.core.node.workflow
    Contains wrapper classes which control the communication between Node and GUI Workflow.

    • Uses of WorkflowContext in org.knime.core.node.workflow

      Methods in org.knime.core.node.workflow that return WorkflowContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WorkflowContext WorkflowContext.Factory.createContext()
      Creates a new workflow context with the information set in this factory.
      WorkflowContext WorkflowManager.getContext()
      Returns the current workflow context or null if no context is available.
      WorkflowContext WorkflowPersistor.getWorkflowContext() 
      WorkflowContext WorkflowLoadHelper.getWorkflowContext()
      Returns a context for the workflow that is being loaded.
      WorkflowContext WorkflowCreationHelper.getWorkflowContext()
      Returns a context for the workflow that is being loaded.
      WorkflowContext PasteWorkflowContentPersistor.getWorkflowContext()
      WorkflowContext InsertWorkflowPersistor.getWorkflowContext()
      WorkflowContext FileWorkflowPersistor.getWorkflowContext()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WorkflowCreationHelper WorkflowCreationHelper.setWorkflowContext(WorkflowContext context)
      Sets the context for the workflow that is being created.
      Constructors in org.knime.core.node.workflow with parameters of type WorkflowContext 
      Constructor and Description
      Factory(WorkflowContext origContext)
      New instance based on the value of the passed reference.
      WorkflowLoadHelper(boolean isTemplate, WorkflowContext workflowContext)
      Creates a new load helper with the given workflow context.
      WorkflowLoadHelper(WorkflowContext workflowContext)
      Creates a new load helper with the given workflow context.
